website_summaries.verdict: Oxygenated bleach with a focus on environmentally safer ingredients. Surprisingly low price point for a "green" cleaning product.
pros: Uses organic ingredients (grapefruit seed, orange peel) for natural cleaning
Very effective on cloth diapers and baby clothes
cons: Not always effective as a grout cleaner

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but effective for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Historic rating for me is 5 stars. Read on to see why my rating may change in the future: I have used this BioKleen oxygen bleach for several years and it does a good job, for what it is. It is not the toxic chlorine bleach that "really" whitens clothes, but BioKleen products have been my main choice for non toxic cleaning products. However, now that the company has been sold to a larger company I do not know if I will continue to use their products. I will be watching the ingredients very carefully from now on to see if the new owners maintain the quality and the ingredients. If not, I will change brands.
customer_reviews.author: V. W.

customer_reviews.title: Worse part is she put it in the dryer and ...
customer_reviews.text: my daughter washed a hockey sweatshirt that was black and yellow. It was a cheap shirt and the black ran all over the yellow. Worse part is she put it in the dryer and the dye set. I used this and although it didn't fix the entire color bleed it made it much better, not so noticeable so yes I was happy with the product. I have been using it in my regular wash also and it has helped with set in stains.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: but I bet you'd like it. Try a canister
customer_reviews.text: This is the second container I have used. I have an old AZ Suns sweatshirt that had some kind of stain on the front. Normal washing did NADA. I paid the directions on Oxygen and stain was gone! Caveat, I have no clue what kinds of stains this stuff can remove, especially if you pay attention to their instructions, but I bet you'd like it. Try a canister, it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for grout!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews and seeing that this is a green product I decided to try it for my filthy grout. It worked great!! I did dissolve it in water and apply it to the grout then let it sit. I cleaned almost 1,000sqft of grout. I will also recommend the grout brush with the extended handle.
customer_reviews.author: Iffy

customer_reviews.title: Did next to nothing.
customer_reviews.text: Saw almost no difference in my clothing and stains. It could not treat even the freshest food stains (fruit). I tried pretreating and also just adding into the wash (according to directions). Tried using a little to using tons. Didn't matter. Pre soaking or placing directly on garment. Nope. The only small improvement I did see was to whites. It was barely noticeable, but it did seem to improve the brightness of whites slightly. This is also pretty expensive for such a small container. Not repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jevo

customer_reviews.title: as was recommended by one of the reviewers - it dried rock-hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried making a paste out of this product and letting it dry, as was recommended by one of the reviewers - it dried rock-hard and I had to chip it out of the grout lines - DON'T LET THE PASTE DRY! I found that a simple solution of bleach and water, and lots of elbow grease, to be just as effective as the mess this stuff creates.
customer_reviews.author: 3jth44

customer_reviews.title: Holy Cow! This stuff really works.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a house and I don't think the kitchen floor grout had ever been cleaned in the past 25 years. I've tried numerous cleaners, I've tried bleach but nothing worked. This past weekend, I used the BioKleen with hot water as recommended for stains on the back. I let it sit for 5 minutes then scrubbed the grout with a brush. It actually came clean and turned white again. I wish I had taken before and after pictures but didn't. This stuff works! Also used some in the laundry and my towels we're super soft and white. Also, NOT ANIMAL TESTED!! Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Cyd

customer_reviews.title: It keeps my whites bright
customer_reviews.text: I add some of this bleach to each laundry load of white and light colors along with regular laundry powder. The end result is no fading or discoloring. There is no smell compared to chlorine bleach. I've been using this bleach for years.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Christian

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: Had a particularly difficult chocolate protein shake spill on a fabric belt. Forgot about it for over a week.. Tried normal washing, scrubbing. No luck. Ordered this product, let it sit in basin over night with product, rinsed then tried one more day. Next day, ALL STAINS REMOVED with no harm to original color, which was beige!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mann

customer_reviews.title: Love all BioKleen’s stuff
customer_reviews.text: Been using BioKleen for as long as I can remember. It works. It smells good and doesn’t over power. My clothes still look new. The powder won’t dissolve in cold water dissolve in hot or warm & add to a cold wash when needed.
customer_reviews.author: MeandIain

customer_reviews.title: Satisified Customer
customer_reviews.text: I had a few shirts with some stains in them. They have already been washed and dried so I thought they were set in and I would have to toss the clothes out. I read about this item and decided to give it a try, and I am very happy I did. The stains are gone!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I didn’t wanna use chlorine bleach anymore. I have noticed a difference in softness of my clothes. We live in an apartment complex and the water is hard so this helps with that. It does whiten my whites after soaking for an hour. The more stubborn stains would probably need to be soaked overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned an extremely dirty wooden deck with biokleen, although it did require lots of scrubing and soaking it did an amazing job removing all the dirt. I did follow up with a Brightener and than stained the deck. The deck looks great. Cheaper than most deck cleaners. Easy to rinse.
customer_reviews.author: DavidTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: So far, this item works really well for cleaning ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, this item works really well for cleaning the bathroom. I bought it to use in the garden to remove algae (read on the Internet) since it's suppose to be safe for the plants (non chlorine, non toxic); haven't tried this product for the yard yet. I most likely will continue using this in replacement for the bleach I grew up with. Especially since breathing in bleach with chlorine fumes can trigger my asthma.
customer_reviews.author: ig

customer_reviews.title: wonderful cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, never heard of oxygen bleach before, wish I had ages ago. Used a small amount in water on a mold patch on some bricks, let it stand for 15 minutes, rinse and NO MOLD!
customer_reviews.author: Maine Train

customer_reviews.title: Product worked fine. Will probably reorder
customer_reviews.text: Used this to remove algae from my pool and patio cement. Doesn't say on the package but I used 8 oz per gallon then scrubbed on and let set for about 20 minutes, followed by a pressure wash. The oxygen bleach killed the algae but it still required some effort with the pressure washer to remove the remains. Product worked fine. Will probably reorder.
customer_reviews.author: BillV

customer_reviews.title: This really works! My whites are whiter and brighter!
customer_reviews.text: My washing machine specifies that I can only use powdered bleach, so I thought I'd give this a try. Unlike the powdered detergent with bleach additive I'd been using (that was also super toxic smelling), this is so much more natural and my whites look visibly whiter and brighter than anything I've ever used, even liquid bleach. This product totally exceeded my expectations! Unfortunately, the shipping price is rather steep on Amazon, but I recently ordered it on Vitaminshoppe.com and got free shipping. I've also spotted it at my local Fred Meyer grocery store (in the nutrition/health section), so I'll just buy it there next time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Paulsen-Reed

customer_reviews.title: Tough on everyday stains
customer_reviews.text: A great alternative to the popular Oxy brand and is tough on stains and great at whitening. I also use the liquid detergent from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to clean grout and it worked wonders. Afterwards, I started using it to remove stains from clothes and during the washing cycle and was also very pleased with the stain removing results with white clothes as well as with colors.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Urdaneta

customer_reviews.title: Not a bleach replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a replacement for bleach in any way. I tried washing my whites with this, and they still look dirty. In the past I've used bleach in the same manner and they have come out looking crisp and clean. I was really excited to use this planet friendly alternative, but it simply doesn't do the job at all (and yes, I used the recommended dosage as per instructions).
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious Felinious

customer_reviews.title: I was quite happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: This produce worked very well on the grout of my tile floor. I mixed it with very hot water and poured onto the grout lines, waited for about 15 and scrubbed the dirt. I was quite happy with the results. Important note. I used WAY to much of the product.... and it was a pain to wash it off of the remainder of my floor... I had a lot of white residue....I must have washed it 5 times. All in all a good product, use it the way they tell you.
customer_reviews.author: TwoAz

customer_reviews.title: Buy this stuff w/the fuller brush long handled grout brush ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy this stuff w/the fuller brush long handled grout brush, and you'll have the cleanest grout ever! I tried everything for years and nothing beats this....
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff to bleach my husband's white gloves. He is a guard at the tomb of the Unknown Soldier. Everything has to be perfect and this gets the job done! I also used them on my son's cloth diapers once a month. I had a blackberry stain on one of my son's best shirts the other day and nothing would get it out. Put a tiny bit of this on there with water. It fizzed up a little and the stain was GONE immediately! BEST STUFF EVER!
customer_reviews.author: loreleigal

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I recently started trying to use environmentally friendly and cruelty free products. I found great reviews on this. A little goes a long way. I'm happy to have found this product. I highly recommend this for whites.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to regular bleach
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an alternative to regular bleach with all the harsh chemicals(some of my family members are allergic to bleach). I've been using it for several months and overall I am very pleased. My clothes come out nice and clean without the noxious fumes of regular bleach. This product contains non-chemical ingredients and is gentle enough for the littlest ones in the household. One scoop usually does the job for a whole wash-load. And the scent is mild without being overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Bigstory

customer_reviews.title: I like this.
customer_reviews.text: My husband sometimes washes a load of his own clothes and he is sometimes uses the bleach that is handy and that is usually chlorine liquid bleach. He is not at all careful and he also may use it on clothing that should not have chlorine bleach. Now I can keep this Oxygen powdered bleach canister handy so if he wants bleach he will use this. It is suitable for non-chlorine bleach and also less apt to spill.
customer_reviews.author: B. M. C

customer_reviews.title: RELIABLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to clean grout, but didn't work all that well. However, I really like it for other cleaning and laundry, even though it is much more expensive than using liquid bleach. Liquid bleach causes so much damage that the extra cost for this may be worth it. .
customer_reviews.author: losfelizshopper

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the white load. I haven't used it on colors yet. Always nervous to do that 😞
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3, let her be

customer_reviews.title: This works awesome. I had a pile of baby clothes with ...
customer_reviews.text: This works awesome. I had a pile of baby clothes with stains on them that did not come out in the washing machine. I soaked them in a bucket of water with this for 3 days and all the stains came out! Amazing! And the whites look whiter too!
customer_reviews.author: k.v.

customer_reviews.title: Gets smells out
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new pair of pants several months ago, but after I washed them I noticed they had a strange sort of chemical smell, and no matter how many times I washed them it never went away. Well, I put two scoops of this in a large load of laundry with these pants, and the smell is gone! All of my clothes smelled super fresh and I noticed that it really helped with some stains too. I'll definitely be adding a scoop to every load from now on! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: a.e.and

customer_reviews.title: Gets clothes smelling clean.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great at getting our clothes extra clean. I've also noticed if I forget to take the clothes out of the washer for a while, they don't stink if I've used this to wash them with. I use it with the Biokleen laundry detergent...about half a scoop of each. I love that the clothes don't stink of perfumes or detergents. They just smell clean.
customer_reviews.author: S. Halstead

customer_reviews.title: To clean or not to clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product originally to use on my shower tile grout because of mold, but it did not clean as well as expected. It did clean well generally and removed the grime from the tile floor. I'm not convinced it does what it says it can do, but I haven't tried it again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve E. Dansby

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I cloth diaper and I got this stuff to help get my diapers clean. I also use it for regular loads of laundry since I am concerned with using bleach and harsh chemicals with my daughter. It doesn't do as well as bleach but definatley gets whites whiter, and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to remove some set-in stains and it worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Compare
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok I guess. I haven’t really been able to see a difference yet.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: My bleach of choice!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd or 3rd time I've purchased this product. It works well, doesn't clump in the washer, and does a great job while not using heavy scents or chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny_Marshes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My tiled shower floor was getting so grungy and even though I tried scrubbing with several different products it wouldn't come clean. This product did the job without any effort. The other reviewers said they left it on for 15 minutes but I left it on a little longer and the tile and grout look like new.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to using this product
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this product to kill weeds in a safe manner but unfortunately found out that this product does not do that. But from reading the questions and answers and also the reviews there are many ways I can use this product in my home and yard. Looking forward to using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Eco

customer_reviews.title: The product did not excellent job on my tiles and grout which was the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product did not excellent job on my tiles and grout which was the task I was ordering it for. Have not tried it on laundry or other cleaning jobs but for now I am very happy with it. You could publish the suggested formula for tile cleaning - I used about 1/2 cup to a gallon of water but may try less powder next time. Any suggestion? d
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product, but make sure you get a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was for TWO containers or I would not have purchased it. Buyer beware! You can get this for much less from other sellers. It's a great product, but make sure you get a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably Environmental...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing job in our shower that had been ignored for too long. And reasonably decent for the environment!
customer_reviews.author: Chuckster

customer_reviews.title: not happy with product
customer_reviews.text: ruined clothing dont use for colors.not happy with product. for handwash the powder didnt dissolve in the water it just splashed all over my clothes while scrubbing.I dint only try once either.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Is not equal to chemical bleach
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to find an alternative to bleach for a more eco friendly clean. This does not clean stains at all. I followed directions and did not see results any better that just washing clothes with regular laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Cleans and Cruelty-Free!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always in search of good cleaning supplies that are cruelty free and I'm so happy I've found the cruelty free dupe for bleach! This stuff has been working so good! I wish it had a scooper but I just grabbed a cooking tablespoon from the kitchen and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used this to clean my deck and was very impresses. It was easy to mix and used a scrub brush with a handle to work it in a bit and it really cleaned the deck without any danger to my flowers surrounding it. Will use it for other things seeing how well it worked on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: LinG

customer_reviews.title: great grout cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to clean kitchen grout- 3 T in 2 cups of water. Let set for 15 minutes or more- and the grout is really clean! We purchased this product to use with the Fuller tile grout E-z scrubber. The two of them together are a great pair!!
customer_reviews.author: smartshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I do not write reviews...but I felt I had to with this product! I had expensive white shirt with a set in brown stain.....I tried several products and nothing worked....I went on line and requested a stain remover and there were a few reviews about this oxygen bleach...went on to Amazon and bought it..soaked it two times in hot water for hours with a few spoonfuls of this....the stain went away!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I add a scoop to the soak/pre rinse cycle for our cloth diapers, and they have never been cleaner looking. It also seems to really help fight ammonia buildup. I've actually started using it on bibs and kitchen towels, I figured if it could fight poop stains, it certainly could fight food stains, and it did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Used for tile and grout cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Mixed some with hot water and sprayed on the tile and grout. Let it sit for 30 minutes to soak in. Used a grout scrub brush that attaches to a broom handle and went to town on our dirty tile. Every thing came out looking great. It did leave a haze on the tile for a few days but that seems to have gone away. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mawhorter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great, I love it and it whitens my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarg8908

customer_reviews.title: if not better, but without the toxic synthetic fragrances
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as OxyClean, if not better, but without the toxic synthetic fragrances. Leaves whites whiter.
customer_reviews.author: SilverWing

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: So I accidentally left a load of towels in my washer for a week last time I went out of town. Pregnant brain at its finest :/ When I discovered the load when I came home it reeked. I tossed about 2 TBSP of the oxygen bleach in with my normal detergent and rewashed the load and the towels not only got clean but smelled better than ever! I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: When I want to brighten an entire load of whites, I add two small cups of this powder bleach, and voila! Even ground-in dirt from white tube socks nearly disappeared. When I couldn't find it where I used to buy it, I was really upset - so I'm very happy to find it here. It really works, and it's eco-friendly to boot.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaJoy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for cleaning our aluminum siding!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this twice now for washing down the aluminum siding on our house and it is fabulous and also safe for the environment and our pets! It cleans very thoroughly and does not require a huge amount to wash a large two story home. We will buy this product again next spring!
customer_reviews.author: wdgolf

customer_reviews.title: ... it for cleaning green mildew off house siding worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for cleaning green mildew off house siding worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had a before picture to show, we had a winter jacket that was getting really dingy and had some dirt stains that never came out in the wash before, we soaked it and then washed and it looks brand new! Wish I would have tried this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: John Ritter

customer_reviews.title: It's not as strong a cleaner as I'd like, but pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It's not as strong a cleaner as I'd like, but pretty good. I like that it's a powder and, most importantly, cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: Articia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Used the solution on dingy carpet and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Used the solution on dingy carpet and it worked well. Used on dog pee on carpet and it also worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M.

customer_reviews.title: great for bridge over creek
customer_reviews.text: on time. great for bridge over creek....no harm to fish or frogs not even caterpillars that fell on bridge!
customer_reviews.author: Claire K  Melton

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing : Removed 18 year-old tough stains!
customer_reviews.text: I had been trying to remove some really tough stains from a quilt that had been there for about 18 years! Regular washes just wouldn't get rid of them. I followed instructions I found online and put the quilt in a large tub/container with some of this oxygen bleach. I let the quilt soak for 2 days and the stains were gone! I put the quilt in the machine with detergent to finish the cleaning process also adding some more oxygen bleach for good measure. The stains are gone; I'm thrilled! The quilt is multi-colored and the colors were not at all affected by the process. This is really a miracle stain remover.
customer_reviews.author: Ariparis

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to clean my grout after watching a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my grout after watching a YouTube video, but it didn't work for me. I'm not sure how it holds up to other uses though.
customer_reviews.author: JKilgore

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I add a tablespoon to every load of laundry. I use to to clean the shower/tub. I used it last summer to wash my composite deck.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove the moss, etc. that had grown on my garage roof over quite a long time. I am amazed! The roof looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: B. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Required rinsing or left tiles dull.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to clean floor grout. Required rinsing or left tiles dull.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Like that has no harsh chlorine
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Bio Kleen. product for many years. Like that has no harsh chlorine, does the job on stains and has a pleasant fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: J LaRae

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work to remove the stains and no return/refund allowed.
customer_reviews.author: fsfsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Did an ok job.
customer_reviews.text: My floors were not that dirty, I wanted more for grout lines. Did an ok job, but you really need it to sit on the floor and absorb into the grout for at least 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Dark eyes

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for some time. I use soap nuts in my laundry and add Bio Kleen. I love the results! No harsh chemicals. Clothes are clean and smell fresh!
customer_reviews.author: WHOLEHEARTED

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well...
customer_reviews.text: Had a porch umbrella that had mildew on it from two seasons of use and not enough sunlight, and this took it out on the first wash and didn't fade the colors. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: JCDeacs

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works as well as advertized, "like magic". It absolutely lifted the dirt out of the grout and made cleaning easy. It also helps lift dirt out of the regular wash. Greatest thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.author: Binnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, using it to keep baby clothes bright & clean!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Henning

customer_reviews.title: I use this for cloth diapers. So far no ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cloth diapers. So far no problems, and it's worked well with the regular laundry too.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but HIGHLY effective
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a wood-planked ceilings under my porch roofs. Mixed o2 bleach with water, sprayed on boards, waited 15 minutes before scrubbing with a soft-bristled brush, and the results were perfect. Every spider web, piece of mildew, etc are gone. Looks as nice as it did when we bought the home 6 years ago. Highly recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used the product three times on the grout in bathroom floor. There was no noticeable improvement.
customer_reviews.author: TBinAvon

customer_reviews.title: Does't work
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work to clean white clothing. I tried the pre soaking and watching it with an extra rinse cycle. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived broken and missing about half of its contents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product, got a stain off of a white shirt I planned on wearing and made it look new again!!.
customer_reviews.author: try4you

customer_reviews.title: My whites are white now.
customer_reviews.text: The product works fairly well in my front loader. My whites come out cleaner and brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Soleigirl

customer_reviews.title: Worked As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to use and cleaned my 26 year old grout to look almost like new. The trick is to let the product sit on the grout for at least 10 minutes then use a scrub brush. Dirt lift right off. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Laundry - not as good as claims
customer_reviews.text: This is an Oxygen Bleach for laundry use (yes, I know it works for grout also). I don't enjoy giving bad reviews, perhaps I just washed the wrong type of items for it to work. It's states "Naturally brightens, whitens & softens", perhaps it does, but it didn't whiten the old diapers I used it on, didn't brighten any colored shirts, and didn't notice any softening. Unless it does something miraculous sitting on the washer, I can't see reordering, to me it was a waste of money. The reason I gave two stars rather than one, it didn't destroy anything.
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is in a smaller bottle and concentrated. Works very well getting out the stains. I use other Bio Kleen products and like them as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to clean the deck, it worked ok got about 70% of the black mold off of the deck paint. I am sure it works well for laundry to.
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper 1

customer_reviews.title: Cost gauge
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. You can buy this for 6$$ elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item after reading online how good it was at getting the grout clean. Honestly, it worked wonderfully! My tile is like new! I definitely recommend this product however some directions on how to use would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Duo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used this on really dirty grout in my kitchen and it worked like a charm with just a little scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: We use this with our cloth diapers as a booster with Tide Powder. It does great!
customer_reviews.author: Sumati

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working great for our cloth diapers! Gentle enough for baby skin.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and safe for the environment (and sensitive skin!)
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Love the environmental aspect, the gentleness on skin and the cleaning power. A big fan of the Bio Kleen line overall.
customer_reviews.author: Staci-Jill Burnley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Graet Stuff especially for the grout use as advertised. Great results
customer_reviews.author: William T Grassam

customer_reviews.title: Kills moss
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to kill the moss around my house. Mixed 1 cup with 1 gal of warm water in a pump sprayer and went to work spraying an even coat on the moss. Did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was so bad. Nearly the entire bottle spilled out into he ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was so bad. Nearly the entire bottle spilled out into he box and pretty much nothing was left in the bottle. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: shringar pangal

customer_reviews.title: Cleans everything!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to clean my stained porcelain sink as well as pretty bad stains on clothing. The sink sparkled, the clothes came out clean. I'd use this again in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: KCF

customer_reviews.title: Works great on the patio clean up
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for scrubbing off very old grease stains on my patio (go to You Tube for how to clean your patio)
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I do not use it for laundry, just cleaning, mostly tile and grout. Works exceptionally well when the directions are followed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ferruzzi

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: i like this alternative bleach. keeps whites white longer. better for enviornment. and i like the fact it can be used on colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Good Bleach Alternative
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work as well as bleach but it works well enough. It is friendlier to the environment and breaks down so that is why I use it. It does help with stains but won't just flat take them out like normal bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Bohman

customer_reviews.title: good detergent
customer_reviews.text: great on clothes great for cleaning shower sick drains with white wine vinegar...eats the soap up
customer_reviews.author: shakes67

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome it has cleared up old stains from my clothes- it well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use to clean grout on tile. Works but not as well as baking soda and vinegar!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Johnston

customer_reviews.title: oxgyen bleach really works
customer_reviews.text: Have used on laundry and carpet stains -- got out stains that nothing else did -- and is not toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret King

product_meta.title: Biokleen Laundry Oxygen Bleach Plus 32 HE Loads - Concentrated Stain Remover, Whitens & Brightens, Eco-Friendly, Non-Toxic, Plant-Based, No Artificial Fragrance or Preservatives, 2 Pounds
feature_bullets: Laundry booster, stain remover and carpet stain remover
